backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
exportFilesEnabled.comment: Indicates whether files should exported to the data directory.
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
overlayBackgroundColor.comment: If overlayEnabled, this is the background color of the overlay block as a Hexadecimal color specifier
overlayEnabled.comment: Indicates whether annotations should be labeled over the image to display the transaction id, content type and size
overlayExifEnabled.comment: Indicates whether key exif data found in images should be labeled over the image in the annotation block
overlayTextColor.comment: If overlayEnabled, this is the color of the overlay text as a Hexadecimal color specifier
textColor.comment: The color of the header text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
